alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Clinton and northeastern Essex Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peasleeville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Peasleeville, Au Sable Forks, Black Brook, Redford, Harkness, North Jay, Clintonville, and Ausable Forks. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 132 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton
